synopsis.text:
Naegino Sora, an aspiring producer, is on a mission to bring the "Legend of the Phoenix" to life. Meanwhile, Layla Hamilton, a Broadway star renowned for her portrayal of the Phoenix, finds herself grappling with a sense of incompleteness. Seeking answers, Layla embarks on a solo bicycle journey across the country, leaving no trace behind. Along her journey, she encounters fellow travelers and performs impromptu shows to fund her trip, each performance becoming a testament to her resilience and a reflection of her past.

Back in New York, Sora, along with May and Ken, is left in a lurch when Layla disappears just two weeks before the premiere. They set out to find her, turning the city upside down in their search. As Layla delves deeper into her self-discovery journey, the question lingers - will she find what she's missing and make it back in time to grace the stage once again? This anime intertwines the tales of two artists striving to reinvent themselves, making for a captivating watch.
